sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';

const ApprovalForm = ({ request, onBack, onSubmit }) => {
    const [feedback, setFeedback] = useState('');
    const [action, setAction] = useState('Approve');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onSubmit(action, feedback);
    };

    return ( <
        div className = "bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6" >
        <
        div className = "flex justify-between items-center mb-4" >
        <
        h2 className = "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900" > Request Approval Form < /h2> <
        button onClick = { onBack }
        className = "text-indigo-600 hover:text-indigo-900 font-medium" >
        &
        larr; Back to Dashboard <
        /button> <
        /div>

        <
        div className = "space-y-4 mb-6" >
        <
        p > < strong > Request ID: < /strong> {request.id}</p >
        <
        p > < strong > Requested By: < /strong> {request.requester}</p >
        <
        p > < strong > Product Type: < /strong> {request.product}</p >
        <
        p > < strong > Purpose: < /strong> {request.purpose}</p >
        <
        p > < strong > Location: < /strong> {request.location}</p >
        <
        /div>

        <
        form onSubmit = { handleSubmit }
        className = "space-y-4" >
        <
        div >
        <
        label className = "block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700" > Action < /label> <
        div className = "mt-1 flex space-x-4" >
        <
        label className = "inline-flex items-center" >
        <
        input type = "radio"
        name = "action"
        value = "Approve"
        checked = { action === 'Approve' }
        onChange = {
            () => setAction('Approve') }
        className = "form-radio" /
        >
        <
        span className = "ml-2 text-gray-700" > Approve < /span> <
        /label> <
        label className = "inline-flex items-center" >
        <
        input type = "radio"
        name = "action"
        value = "Reject"
        checked = { action === 'Reject' }
        onChange = {
            () => setAction('Reject') }
        className = "form-radio" /
        >
        <
        span className = "ml-2 text-gray-700" > Reject < /span> <
        /label> <
        /div> <
        /div> <
        div >
        <
        label htmlFor = "feedback"
        className = "block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700" > Feedback < /label> <
        textarea id = "feedback"
        name = "feedback"
        rows = "4"
        value = { feedback }
        onChange = {
            (e) => setFeedback(e.target.value) }
        className = "mt-1 block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
        placeholder = "Enter feedback..." >
        < /textarea> <
        /div> <
        button type = "submit"
        className = "bg-indigo-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:bg-indigo-700 transition-colors duration-300 w-full" >
        Submit <
        /button> <
        /form> <
        /div>
    );
};

export default ApprovalForm;
